Planned Parenthood PAC of Oregon: s claim that John Kitzhaber is the only pro-choice candidate in the race for governor.
Chris Dudley: s stance on abortion, including his support for restrictions such as parental notification for minors, limits on late-term abortions, and efforts to reduce abortion through education and abstinence.
Dudley: s commitment to not using a single-issue litmus test when nominating judges, appointing board members, or approving legislation related to abortion or reproductive rights.
